column4: hey -- i got some weird scanner driver here which requires a terribly old version of some library, but works fine with the new one (just dpkg doesn't know that). if forced dpkg to install the package ignoring the dependency, and everything works fine; only apt-get complains about borken dependencies
can i make apt ignore those dependency conflicts?
You could probably just symlink the old name to the new one.
where? i already symlinked the library to make it work ;P
